aboutOzone.title: What is
aboutOzone.p1: Ozone (O₃) is a triatomic oxygen molecule, a powerful natural oxidizer. It is formed from atmospheric oxygen using electrical discharge.
aboutOzone.p2: Upon contact with microorganisms, ozone destroys their cell membranes, then decomposes into ordinary oxygen (O₂), leaving no harmful chemical residues.

list.safe: Safe for humans and animals after decomposition

technology.pageDescription: Learn how ozonation technology works. Comparison of ozone and chlorine. 7 ozonation functions in one device.

header.title: How ozonation works
header.subtitle: Learn the principle of operation and its advantages over traditional disinfection methods

process.title: Operating
process.subtitle: Ozonation is a simple and effective 4-step process

step1.title: Ozone generation
step1.text: The ozone generator creates O₃ molecules from atmospheric oxygen using electrical discharge

step2.title: Distribution
step2.text: Ozone is distributed throughout the room or dissolved in water, reaching all surfaces

step3.title: Disinfection
step3.text: Ozone molecules contact microorganisms and destroy their cell membranes

step4.title: Decomposition
step4.text: After completion, ozone decomposes into ordinary oxygen O₂, leaving no traces

comparison.title: Ozone vs
comparison.subtitle: Comparison of two disinfection methods by key parameters

functions.title: 7 functions of
functions.subtitle: One device solves multiple disinfection and treatment tasks

disinfection.title: Disinfection
disinfection.text: Destruction of bacteria, viruses and microorganisms

disinsection.title: Pest control
disinsection.text: Destruction of insects and their larvae

applicationsPage.pageDescription: Ozonation applications in poultry farming, food industry, hotels, medicine and water treatment. Specific results and benefits.

header.title: Application areas
header.subtitle: Ozonation is successfully used in poultry farming, food industry, HoReCa, medicine and water treatment

poultry.title: Poultry farming
poultry.description: Ozonation is a key technology for modern poultry farms. It provides disinfection at all production stages: from incubation to finished product storage.

eggs.title: Incubation egg disinfection
eggs.text: 92-98% effectiveness. Increase in young stock output by 0.8-2.0%. Safer than formaldehyde.

feed.title: Feed sanitization
feed.text: Reduction of mold fungi by 97% in 1 hour. Increase in feed digestibility by 15%.

water.title: Drinking water treatment
water.text: Destruction of E.coli, salmonella at concentration of 0.3-1.0 g/m³.

storage.title: Meat shelf life extension
storage.text: From 5-7 days to 21-30 days refrigerated without freezing.

food.title: Food industry
food.description: Ozonation extends product shelf life while maintaining quality and freshness without chemical preservatives.

vegetables.title: Vegetable and fruit storage
vegetables.text: Mold and yeast destruction. Potato storage extension by 2.5 months.

detox.title: Product detoxification
detox.text: Toxin neutralization without changing product structure and taste.

packaging.title: Container treatment
packaging.text: Disinfection of transport and reusable containers before product packaging.

cold.title: Cold storage and warehouses
cold.text: Maintaining air cleanliness and freshness, preventing mold growth.

horeca.title: HoReCa
horeca.description: Hotels, restaurants and cafes use ozonation to create a perfectly clean environment and eliminate odors.

rooms.title: Rooms and halls
rooms.text: Complete elimination of tobacco, food, dampness odors. Fresh air without fragrances.

kitchen.title: Kitchens and utility rooms
kitchen.text: Disinfection of work surfaces and equipment without chemicals.

ventilation.title: Ventilation systems
ventilation.text: Duct cleaning from bacteria, mold and unpleasant odors.

medical.title: Medical facilities
medical.description: Ozonation provides the highest level of sterility in medical facilities, meeting SanPiN requirements.

wards.title: Ward and operating room disinfection
wards.text: Complete destruction of pathogens, including chlorine-resistant viruses.

equipment.title: Equipment sterilization
equipment.text: Treatment of medical instruments and devices.

time.title: Quick application
time.text: Ozone decomposition time to safe level: 1.5-2 hours.

waterSection.title: Water treatment
waterSection.description: 95% of drinking water in Europe is treated with ozone. It is the most effective and safe water purification method.

drinking.title: Drinking water
drinking.text: Ozone is 12 times more soluble in water than chlorine. Complete sanitization.

quality.title: Quality improvement
quality.text: Elimination of odors, tastes, turbidity. Improvement of organoleptic properties.

pools.title: Pools and water parks
pools.text: Clean water without eye and skin irritation, without chlorine smell.

safety.title: Safety
safety.text: Does not form dangerous chlorine-containing compounds (trichloramines).

content.title: We are
content.p1: We are a team of specialists in ozone technologies. Our mission is to make disinfection safe, effective and accessible for businesses of any size.
content.p2: We believe the future belongs to eco-friendly technologies that do not harm the environment and human health. Ozonation is exactly such a technology.
